text: @TMobile @Tesla I would take my tesla on a family trip once covid is over , ever since coronavirus we haven’t got to go on any adventures as a family or see anywhere out of our home state. I would love to visit hawaii soon with my family and make them happy. #TMobileTuesdays #contest #Tesla

domain.name: Place
